subject: ✅ REAL Email Test from Integration Service
body:
🎉 Success! Email Service is Working!

Hello Ishika,

This is a REAL EMAIL sent from your Integration Service!

Email Service Status:

  • SMTP Configuration: Working
  • Database Logging: Active
  • Email Templates: Functional
  • API Endpoints: Operational

You can now use this service to send emails programmatically!


Best regards,

Integration Service Team
